turns.speaker: user

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I can certainly assist you with streamlining your medical billing process. To start, could you tell me which billing software you are currently using and what types of claims you primarily process (e.g., Medicare, Medicaid, commercial insurance)?

turns.speaker: user

turns.speaker: agent

Also, can you provide the provider NPI and the corresponding taxonomy code? I can verify that information is accurately listed with PECOS, which often leads to claim rejections if out of date.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: You're right, handling diagnosis and procedure code mismatches based on individual payer policies can be complex. This will allow Medisoft to flag potential mismatches based on known payer requirements. We can also set up alerts for diagnosis codes that typically require pre-authorization for certain procedures. For hands-on training on Medisoft's claim scrubbing features, I can provide links to relevant tutorials and documentation, or connect you with a Medisoft certified consultant.
